revised_title: Photolytic Preparation of Cyclopentadienyl and Phenyl Nitrene from Benzene Derivatives
tldr: The authors describe the photolytic preparation of cyclopentadienyl and phenyl nitrene from benzene derivatives using flash photolysis. They observe and analyze the transient spectra of these radicals, providing insights into the photochemical reactions and ring fission processes occurring in aromatic compounds.
